data1.Desc: An error occurs when installing the Spring Boot Fat Jar Builder application package from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing some WordPress plugins on the LiteSpeed and LLSMP servers
The 'ERR_TOO_MANY_REDIRECTS' error occurs when accessing the admin panel for the WordPress Cluster based on the NGINX server
An error occurs when installing the osTicket application package based on PHP 8.2 from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when deploying a stack on Docker Swarm from the YAML file that is not in the root directory
All the 'incorrect domain' errors for the Let’s Encrypt add-on should have the error coded
Missing description for the Let’s Encrypt error related to network issues
An error occurs when installing Eclipse Che from the ‘release candidate’ image version
An error occurs when accessing the Jitsi application after installation from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when installing the Eclipse Che 7.0.0-RC-1.1 application version from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when accessing the IOTA application after installation from the platform Marketplace
The httpd service fails on the Apache nodes if the pid file is missing during the container’s start/stop/restart
Cloned LiteSpeed ADC balancer has backends from the original environment listed in the configs
The workerProcesses value is not updated in the lslbd_config.xml file if changed via the add-on
Access to the /home/jelastic home folder is not granted after the FTP add-on installation on the Spring Boot server
The Varnish load balancer node is not started after the redeployment
An error occurs when installing Multi-Regional WordPress Cluster
The self-signed SSL certificate is not generated after the LiteSpeed ADC balancer creation
The lsrestart.log file has an incorrect owner on the LiteSpeed and LLSMP servers
Incorrect values in the /etc/jelastic/metainf.conf file on the LLSMP server
The skip-networking option is missing when resetting the MariaDB password on the LEMP/LLSMP servers
The license key registration attempts should be enumerated in LiteSpeed WS and ADC server logs
An error occurs when reloading the LLSMP server with the 'jem service reload' command
An error occurs when restoring from the WordPress backup after the backup storage node is changed
An error occurs when accessing the Jenkins application after redeployment from the version based on Java 11 to Java 17

data2.Desc: An error occurs when mounting files from some custom Docker containers
Errors are logged during projects auto-deploy on containers with enabled sendmail functionality
An error occurs when executing some commands that include a file download operation
Custom Docker containers cannot be created from images that use the OCI manifest schema
A scroll slider appears in the environment configuration settings panel even if there is enough space to fit the content
The shared files owner is changed to root when resetting a password for the FTP add-on on the Shared Storage node
The URL_DOCS_OOM_KILLER_TROUBLESHOOTING placeholder is not replaced with a link in emails
